note.p: American businessman. Dry goods merchant in Penn Yan, New York, from at least 1850. Resident in retirement in Auburn, New York, 1881.
United States city directories, 1822–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 October 2020)
United States Federal Census 1850 (Milo, Yates, New York [1]/196b), 1860 (Milo, Yates, New York [1]/615), 1880 (Auburn, Cayuga, New York 6/813) (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 October 2020)
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 October 2020)
